assassin-s-dagger.title: Assassin's Dagger
assassin-s-dagger.description: A killer cutter that in the right hands can fell a foe in a single strike.

batterfly-knife.title: Batterfly Knife
batterfly-knife.description: A keen knife that paralyses its prey part of the time.

bronze-knife.title: Bronze Knife
bronze-knife.description: A nifty knife made of a softish alloy.

darting-dagger.title: Darting Dagger
darting-dagger.description: A legendary knife that imparts unbeatable briskness.

deadly-nightblade.title: Deadly Nightblade
deadly-nightblade.description: A nefarious knife for nimble-fingered ne'er-do-wells.

deft-dagger.title: Deft Dagger
deft-dagger.description: A mysterious knife that imparts unbeatable briskness.

divine-dagger.title: Divine Dagger
divine-dagger.description: A bitsy blade bathed in holy light that zealously zaps zombies.

dread-dagger.title: Dread Dagger
dread-dagger.description: An unnerving knife that paralyses its prey part of the time.

dynamo-dagger.title: Dynamo Dagger
dynamo-dagger.description: A matchless knife that imparts unbeatable briskness.

falcon-knife-earring.title: Falcon Knife Earring
falcon-knife-earring.description: A divine earring that delivers a double attack.

fenrir-fang.title: Fenrir Fang
fenrir-fang.description: A snowy stabber that emits icicles if used as an item in battle.

special.usage: Deals 25-35 Ice damage to all enemies

flame-tang.title: Flame Tang
flame-tang.description: A fiery dagger for a triumphant trouper.

gladius.title: Gladius
gladius.description: A famed dagger for a heralded hero.

icicle-dirk.title: Icicle Dirk
icicle-dirk.description: A nippy knife that emits icicles if used as an item in battle.

special.usage: Deals 25-35 Ice damage to all enemies

paring-knife.title: Paring Knife
paring-knife.description: A gnat of a knife that might be used for chopping up veggies.

poison-moth-knife.title: Poison Moth Knife
poison-moth-knife.description: A knife that's known to paralyse its prey part of the time.

poison-needle.title: Poison Needle
poison-needle.description: A prickly pin that can fell a foe with a single stab if correctly aimed.

special.effect: Chance to inflict instant death; normal attacks cannot be blocked and always deal 1 damage

pruning-knife.title: Pruning Knife
pruning-knife.description: A magical blade that can cause critical damage if it hits the spot.

soul-breaker.title: Soul Breaker
soul-breaker.description: A sinister serrated blade that weakens enemies' weapons.

special.effect: Chance to lower enemy attack a little

sword-breaker.title: Sword Breaker
sword-breaker.description: A stout, serrated blade that weakens enemies' weapons.

special.effect: Chance to lower enemy attack a little
